settings.title: Product
settings.description: The products on our website are all gluten free. We do NOT have any vegan products at this time.

settings.title: Return Policy
settings.description:
All Sales are Final with the exception of damaged goods. If your product arrives damaged, please take pictures of the damaged item immediately and send details with pictures to info@Lovecbd.com within 2 business days of when product is received.

Refunds (if applicable)

Once your refund inquiry is received, we may require that the item be shipped back to us for inspection. We will send you an email to notify you that we have received your inquiry and/or returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days. 

Late or missing refunds (if applicable)

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.  Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.  Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at info@Lovecbd.com.

settings.title: Product Availability
settings.description: Availability displayed on this Site does not guarantee product availability and or immediate shipment of these products. LoveCBD reserves the right, without liability or prior notice, to discontinue, revise, cease to make available, and or cancel orders on these products.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.description:
Orders are typically processed and shipped Monday - Wednesday, excluding holidays. We only ship LoveCBD on those days in order to ensure that the chocolate does not melt in transit. Orders Received after 10am Pacific on Wednesday may not be shipping until the following Monday.

We only offer Priority Mail shipping at this time. We do NOT offer expedited shipping. Depending on your location, delivery time will be 1-3 days after the order has left the warehouse. Priority shipping begins once the package has left our warehouse. Shipping does not take into account order processing time which can vary.

For wholesale orders - smaller wholesale orders will also be sent priority mail with 1-3 day delivery. Larger wholesale orders that can be shipped on a pallet can be sent via refrigerated truck and may take up to 5 days in transit.

We ship to all 50 US states, Canada, Mexico, and the United Kingdom.

Please view our brief “link a Shipping Policy”

settings.title: Wholesale
settings.description:
We currently export to all 50 US states, Canada, Mexico, and the United Kingdom. We do not have an international export program for any other countries, but will be rolling out the program soon.

For payment, we only accept wholesale orders via credit card, paid prior to shipping at this time. We are working on an ACH/Bank Transfer option coming soon. 

When submitting a wholesale request, please send some proof of a business (resale tax id, location of shop, website, etc). We will also need a copy of your valid resale or business license.

settings.title: United States Sales Tax
settings.description: Residents of the state of Florida are subject to sales tax.

settings.text: Be the first to know about new collections and exclusive offers.
